metadata.title: CVE-2021-28905 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In function lys_node_free() in libyang <= v1.0.225, it asserts that the value of node->module can't be NULL. But in some cases, node->module can be null, which triggers a reachable assertion (CWE-617).

criterions.comment: libyang package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
